divs: Sighting DetailsLOCATION: APT BALCONY WITNESS: AIR VEHICLE WITH NO NOISE BUT BIG OBJECT FOR BEING LOW. COMMON VEHICLE IN AREA: SEEN MANY PLANES LANDING PATH TO ORLANDO INT AND PERSONAL ARIPLANE LANDING IN NEAR LAKE. VEHICLE IS NOT FAST ENOUGH FOR FLIGHT MOVEMENT TO LAND OR SMALL FOR NO NOISE. I HAVE OVER 24 YEARS OF MILITARY SERVICE, LOOK TO ME LIKE A FAST TRIANGLE BLIMP. WEATHER: LOW CLOUD AND STREET LIGHTS. OBJECT DID NOT TURN LIGHTS UNTIL OVER LAKE AND THEN TURN OFF ONCE ON SR-436. NO OBSERVIBLE NOICE BUT THE DID TURN OFF LIGHT ONCE THE TURN FROM MY DIRECTION AND TURN AWAY. TIME BETWEEN LIGHTS ON ON VIDEO TO LIGTHS TURN OFF ON PHOTO, 15 SECONDS.
